scorePoints.rowLabel: Go to How to play page and find different points systems for different match formats.

scorePoints.headingName: How much time it will take to get the winning money ?
scorePoints.rowLabel: It will take to upto 2-4hr to double check the points of the match and give out the winnings.

scorePoints.headingName: Scores are wrong. Please check and update fast
scorePoints.rowLabel: Sometimes the points will vary based on the scores given by our provider, but be sure that we'll be double checking the Scores & points before we announce the winners.
